4308000.name: MILES 27: Look Like You
4308000.description:
• MILES27 is a psychological horror game driven by a single, continuous narrative, with a strong focus on atmosphere and storytelling. Inspired by disturbing real-life cases, the game draws players into a story that becomes darker and more unsettling as it unfolds.

  • The story progresses through chapters, with each chapter serving as a part of the main narrative. As players move forward, they gradually uncover events, characters, and the hidden truths behind what is happening. The goal is not only to progress, but to understand the reality behind the experience.

  • MILES27 builds tension through a dense atmosphere, detailed environmental design, and high-quality visuals. Lighting, sound design, and spatial composition are carefully crafted to create a constant sense of being watched and unsafe.

  • Gameplay focuses on exploration, environmental interaction, and story-driven progression. With a minimal interface and limited guidance, players become fully immersed in the narrative and begin to question what is real.

MILES27 is designed for players who want to experience psychological pressure, the darker aspects of the human mind, and an unsettling sense of uncertainty.
